BUTTONS.COULD_NOT_AUTOSELECT: We couldn't auto select a board but don't worry, you have boards saved! Click the dropdown above and select a board.
BUTTONS.NAME: Name

LIVE_EVENTS.COULD_NOT_AUTOSELECT: We could not auto select a live event group. Click the dropdown and select one!
LIVE_EVENTS.NAME: Name

RUNNING_NOT_CONNECTED: Ready, but nothing is connected at this time.

THEME.NAME: Theme
THEME.DESCRIPTION: Choose your color theme for Firebot!

LANGUAGE.NAME: Language
LANGUAGE.DESCRIPTION: Change the language used for Firebot's interface.

MINIMIZE_TO_TRAY.NAME: Minimize to Tray
MINIMIZE_TO_TRAY.DESCRIPTION: When minimized, Firebot will minimize to tray instead of task bar

CONNECTION_SOUNDS.NAME: Connection Sounds
CONNECTION_SOUNDS.DESCRIPTION: Get audible alerts when Firebot connects or disconnects.

SOUND_OUTPUT_DEVICE.NAME: Sound Output Device
SOUND_OUTPUT_DEVICE.DESCRIPTION: Change what output device app sounds (ie connect/disconnect sounds) and Play Sound Effects are sent to.

BETA_NOTIFICATIONS.NAME: Beta Notifications
BETA_NOTIFICATIONS.DESCRIPTION: Firebot automatically updates to new stable versions. It does not automatically update to betas or major new releases however. Enable if you want to be notified of new beta releases.

FEATURE_MY_STREAM.NAME: Feature My Stream on Firebot.app
FEATURE_MY_STREAM.DESCRIPTION_PREFIX: Enable this setting to have your stream displayed on

LIVE_STREAM_STATS.NAME: Live Stream Stats
LIVE_STREAM_STATS.DESCRIPTION: Select which stream stats show in the top bar when live.

INACTIVE_VIEWER_TIME.NAME: Inactive Viewer Time
INACTIVE_VIEWER_TIME.DESCRIPTION: The amount of time it takes for an active viewer to be marked as inactive after their last chat message.

OPEN_STREAM_PREVIEW_ON_LAUNCH.NAME: Open Stream Preview on Launch
OPEN_STREAM_PREVIEW_ON_LAUNCH.DESCRIPTION: Automatically open the Stream Preview window when Firebot launches.

CURRENCY_PAGE.NO_CURRENCY_SAVED: No currencies saved. You should make one! :)

HOTKEYS_PAGE.NO_HOTKEYS_SAVED: No hotkeys saved. You should make one! :)

GENERAL.NAME: General
GENERAL.DESCRIPTION: Various settings for appearance, beta notifications, and more.

SETUPS.NAME: Setups
SETUPS.DESCRIPTION: Share your best creations with others. Or import others!

TRIGGERS.NAME: Triggers
TRIGGERS.DESCRIPTION: Tweak the behaviors of various triggers (commands, events, etc)

DATABASE.NAME: Database
DATABASE.DESCRIPTION: Options and tools for the viewer database.

OVERLAY.NAME: Overlay
OVERLAY.DESCRIPTION: Add new fonts, create new instances, and other overlay settings.

INTEGRATIONS.NAME: Integrations
INTEGRATIONS.DESCRIPTION: Link Firebot to a growing list of third party tools and apps.

TTS.NAME: TTS
TTS.DESCRIPTION: Settings for the default TTS voice.

BACKUPS.NAME: Backups
BACKUPS.DESCRIPTION: Manage backups and backup settings to ensure your data is never lost.

SCRIPTS.NAME: Scripts
SCRIPTS.DESCRIPTION: Configure script settings, add start up scripts, and more.

ADVANCED.NAME: Advanced
ADVANCED.DESCRIPTION: Various advanced settings such as debug mode, while loops, and other tools
